sentence.text: Patients with autosomal dominant vibratory urticaria have localized hives and systemic manifestations in response to dermal vibration, with coincident degranulation of antigen receptor-mediated signaling pathway cells and increased histamine levels in serum.

We identified a previously unknown missense substitution in cell adhesion (also known as EMR2), which was predicted to result in the replacement of cysteine with tyrosine at amino acid position 492 (p.C492Y), as the only nonsynonymous variant cosegregating with vibratory urticaria in two large kindreds.
